website_summaries.verdict: Smooth operating freshwater reel that has the toughness to stand up to all kinds of fishing conditions.
pros: Shielded ball bearings ensure a reel that will give you a smooth cranking motion
Gives you a watertight construction that works great in both freshwater and saltwater
Uses three high performance HT-100 drag washers for a high level of performance
cons: May not match the durability of older Penn freshwater fishing reel models

customer_reviews.title: Peen Spinfisher  SS4500V
customer_reviews.text: I have used "Penn Spinfisher SS reals for 40 years. From the 420 SS UL, to there 8500 SS big water real and have never had any trouble at all. They cost a bit more than some ,less than others and the quality is always there. I also like to use Penn rods matched with the size reel I have . Matched they are an unbeatable combo. The Newer Reels for the super line are a nice touch. Peen just keeps getting better, Right-On PEEN. Take care of them and they will last a life time. Thanks, Tom
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Penn spinfisher ssv4500 perfect reel pair with ugly stik tiger elite
customer_reviews.text: Wow very happy just what i wanted the ssv4500 Penn spinfisher i got it all in one very light weight powerful and nice looking perfect size for inshore fishing on any rod love it highly recommend it....🎣
customer_reviews.author: Ruben.t

customer_reviews.title: Penn is best bang for the buck . Killer reel.
customer_reviews.text: This reel is a beast . In its price range , I trust it every single bit as my reels that cost much more. Stripers , gator Blues or Benito and Yellowfin.... This reel puts fish in the boat . Never one single issue. Don't get caught up in fancy name and marketing BS..Penn gets it done !
customer_reviews.author: RC GLIDER GUIDER

customer_reviews.title: Always good however
customer_reviews.text: penn battles rock but over time the tiny parts in this reel give way. I went to the conflict- the black ones and they seem to better. Now I went full spin fishers and they are rock solid water tight fully sealed. if you are gonna kayak fish or get salty splash on your reel go for pen spin fisher. I fish hard and often and fresh water rinse after each use then I spray silicone or reel magic to remove water then wipe clean. if you buy nice stuff take care of it. my buddy has penns 30 years old still work perfect! hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: tom beck

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, casts incredibly smooth
customer_reviews.text: high quality, heavy, looks nice, casts incredibly smooth, im not a fishing pro just recreational and its been great for that use
customer_reviews.author: Chris Singarella

customer_reviews.title: Should mention Manual Bail in the description
customer_reviews.text: I have two 4500 ssg reels that I love for surfcasting. They're getting old and I replace parts as they wear or break, especially the bail spring and dog (trips the bail). I had the Spinfisher SSV4500 in my wish list and my wife got it for me for Christmas. I haven't fished with it yet, but I didn't know it was manual bail until I tried it and the bail trip was very hard and then I read the comments. I like the manual bail and do that with my old reels . I just wish they had put that in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing!! Use it for freshwater. I know it's for salt but it works wondeful for me! Caught some bass already highest was 5lbs and it's performances is wondeful!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drag
customer_reviews.text: First fish with this reel was a 45" Amberjack and he really fought hard. Thank goodness for good line and the quality drag on this reel. As always amazing Penn quality.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Best surf reel I have
customer_reviews.text: Best surf reel I’ve had not a pro but not a novice either caught everything from surf perch to halibut in the pacific surf great reel butter smooth retrieve easy to cast and the drag is insane...worth the price..this is my second spin fisher v
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: I've never been careful about keeping my reels clean from the salt water so its nice to finally have a reel that will not get ..
customer_reviews.text: Clean, smooth, doesn't flinch when exposed to sand or salt water. Went surf fishing last weekend all the way up and down the California coast and it is a huge improvement over the Walmart specials I previously owned. I've never been careful about keeping my reels clean from the salt water so its nice to finally have a reel that will not get ruined easily.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: great for its class, and price point
customer_reviews.text: Well built and very smooth. Infinite anti-reverse, fully sealed, anodized accessories, and sturdy body accentuate this model. Great entry level inshore reel. If you use hard lures this is model works great. Excellent beach trough and breaker wave range. Lacks the braided line capacity for long casting +1oz without a shock leader. If you use live bait or slow jig, the 4500 LL is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: for the price and limited use for pond fishing, it does very well. all the features of a good spinning reel
customer_reviews.author: urmoney

customer_reviews.title: The drag
customer_reviews.text: The drag is superior to other reels as far as stopping power is. I fish mostly in saltwater, so it's important to have a reel that's sealed. It has never let me down. I did however have to replace the drag dics on one reel. Cannot complaine, it was 20 yrs old an useed 3 to 4 times a week. I redfish an snook fish the most. Caught a 35 lbs cobis once on the old reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Holds a ton of braided line and casts way out there.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Most expensive reel I own, and best
customer_reviews.text: Costs a bit more, but quality is excellent, glad I make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Smooth drag. Amazing durability... Once taken apart it is easily cleaned and works like new again. Dropped one in salt water for 30 minutes before finding it. Took it apart and cleaned/oiled/greased it. Still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Domonoske

customer_reviews.title: Best salt water reel ever
customer_reviews.text: Best salt water reel ever. I used this several times at the beach and because it is sealed when I go to use it the next time it works like new after just rinsing it. Any other reel I ever use would have problems after a few times no matter how you clean it, as far as spinning reels would go.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Handyman

customer_reviews.title: A solid option!
customer_reviews.text: Very robust reel with extremely smooth spinning action. It's an American product and its quality really shines. Looking forward to many years with this one. It is a bit heavier than it's competitors but it also doesn't feel flimsy like it's competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: love this Fishing Reel
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a problem, love this Fishing Reel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Given 3 stars due to sending the first one back ...
customer_reviews.text: Given 3 stars due to sending the first one back after one fish caught. The reel started a grinding noise on the upstroke occilation of the spool. New one has been flawless although I haven't fished it that heavily. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spinning reel... Has caught many fish by the time this is posted... Wish I could afford more.

customer_reviews.title: Great real for the fishing I do
customer_reviews.text: Great real for the fishing I do. Its a little stiff on the retrieve. Probably needs a good lubrication with that Quantium hot sauce. I have it filled with 14lb mono and use it on a 8' Shimano Temar rod. Amazon had the best price around.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel. Smooth and powerful. Hascranked in 40" drum many times.

customer_reviews.title: I removed the washer/gasket and it screwed on just fine. I am sure the gasket/washer was there for ...
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the reel , I took it out of the box and the bearing cover fell off . I tried to put it back on but it would not screw on . I removed the washer/gasket and it screwed on just fine . I am sure the gasket/washer was there for a purpose . Other than that issue ,I am enjoying the reel .

customer_reviews.title: HE says it's one the the best Penn Reels he has and lovers it

customer_reviews.text: Great all around saltwater (inshore) reel....sealed feature is a big help to keep it working condition around kids. This is my second one...love them both.

customer_reviews.text: Smooth and powerful the fish don't have a chance !

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and solid reel... I've selected this ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and solid reel... I've selected this over the Japanese brands due the the price point-water resistance-feature-rigidity-and parts availability from Penn (even after the reel is discontinued)... I share my hobby with my son and I handle with care / plan to keep my stuff for a long period of time so parts availability is one major consideration for me...

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this reel
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth long caster! I am very happy with this reel.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fishing reel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fishing reel! I have had problems with other makers of saltwater spinning reels disintegrating after a few trips to the beach. Sand and saltwater come right off after a quick rinse and drip dry.

customer_reviews.title: otherwise happy with it
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff initially but it has loosened up with time, otherwise happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: My 6th Penn, and the best yet
customer_reviews.text: That may not sound like many reels- but that's over 10 years. And I fish the surf regularly. Penn is durability. And I think this reel is the best. The feel of it is great. The drag is outstanding...but the sealed body is really what got me to buy. After my trusty SSG went down, I upgraded to this and won't look back. Skip the Battle and get this reel- it's DEFINITELY worth the little extra $

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband, had a big smile on his face when he opened this gift.

customer_reviews.title: Spinfisher reels are great!
customer_reviews.text: These Penn Spinsfisher reels are my favorite reels ever. They really hang in there when fighting large false albacore!

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Handle and handle cap did not screw in flush leaving gaps on both sides. I was concerned that sand, dirt and water would get inside. I also own a Penn 7500SS and those screwed in flush. The made in USA 7500SS has performed flawlessly for years. Looks like the quality of Penn has declined since they started making them in China. I returned the 4500 reel and bought a Fin-Nor Lethal 40, which BTW has a promo on where you get a waterproof tackle bag for the cost of shipping($12.95).
customer_reviews.author: Bernard O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding reel. Finally go to use it yesterday with ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding reel. Finally go to use it yesterday with no issues. Will update once I catch a few more and larger fish with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great reel! Solid and study with a great retrieve
customer_reviews.text: Great reel! Solid and study with a great retrieve! Balances perfectly with a 9ft 3/4-1oz surf rod like an Airwave, as well as a 7ft 1/2-1oz Allegience.

customer_reviews.text: Pros : Sturdy, great drag Cons : heavy I've also noticed it doesn't cast as well as my Shimano Saros.

customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and finish. The name says it all. Got the 4500 for surf fishing.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice piece of machinery

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful REEL!!!

Amazing drag system and we love it can be sprayed off with water and has very little maintenance requirements. Highly recommend for the novice or experienced angler.

customer_reviews.title: works great. Already caught some stripers with it
customer_reviews.text: Showed up right away, works great. Already caught some stripers with it. Still new but very smooth so far!

customer_reviews.title: Penn SSV4500 Spinfisher V
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel! This is my first Penn SSV4500 Spinfisher V reel. I have several Penn reels and I think this is my favorite. Very smooth action and best of all it's a sealed reel. I'm definitely going to purchase another. Great reel for a great price!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent reel. I have the Spinfisher V 4500. It's great for inshore fishing and rivers for salmon or steelhead. It would work on any big largemouth bass in the south too. I also have the Battle but the Spinfisher V is a better reel. This reel is incredibly smooth and fine tuned. Penn makes great spinning reels!

customer_reviews.title: Bad Reel
customer_reviews.text: Junk, brand new out of the box and the bail won't close after you cast. Just hangs up have to do it manually.

customer_reviews.title: just the best

customer_reviews.title: This is one tough real
customer_reviews.text: Great real and drag system works flawlessly this real handle saltwater very well very just wish they were made in America

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs a switch to allow the reel to unwind without flipping the bail or pulling against the drag.
customer_reviews.author: Ray A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these reels as I have been using Penn for over 30 years and I still have 2 that work great. I wanted to expand my inventory. Since the reels are made now in China instead of USA I wondered about the quality. When I received the reels both bails lock when in the open position and would not close as other penn reels do when the handle is rotated. I was very disappointed and returned the reels for credit. I was contacted by Penn rep and he said "that's the way they are made now" Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: hayitzmeee

customer_reviews.title: Great spinning reel

customer_reviews.text: The reel performed well without a doubt. However, the item shipped to me had scratches near handle socket while the small screws in the said socket had damage heads that won't allow any screw driver to get it unscrewed. Other than that the reel performed well.

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to be a pro to realize the ...
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to be a pro to realize the quality of this reel. It's buttery smooth, near silent, and the drag does it job perfectly. I typically fish on the weekends for recreation and this reel is rock solid.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Reel
customer_reviews.text: The Reel from Penn is awsome. Exactly what I was looking for (5th gen SSV 4500 )and the price is very hard to beat. The company that sold the item on the other hand really took their time even though the item was said to be in stock. Atleast I did receive it for opening day of Striper season. Thanx. (delivery took 17 days)
customer_reviews.author: R. Bencze

customer_reviews.title: Best reeal I've had.
customer_reviews.text: I just started surfishing a year ago. been using cheap sports authority reel rod combos until I decided to step up. I paired the penn ssv 4500 with a tsunami airwave rode and let me tell you that this is a hell of a reel. strong, light, fast, small with a brand name backing you up. all you want when you are on the run and gun in the beach!. I strongly recommend this reel if you are moving from a starter combo. the thing is that even if i had the money to buy a $500 bucks reel I would never leave this one aside.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Arango

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not a great reel
customer_reviews.text: This reel has many good reviews so I bought it. Wish I hadn't. Hate the handle & found the line retrieval rough.

customer_reviews.title: I'm guessing it was penns fault. The reel was ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm guessing it was penns fault. The reel was making a grinding noise when the spool reached the bottom if the turn. I had my reel repair guy open it up because it was cheaper and faster than shipping. There was an extra screw just sitting in the bottom of the reel case.
customer_reviews.author: bailey scarboro

customer_reviews.title: penn spinfisher V 4500
customer_reviews.text: This is an amended review as I did receive this item. It's nice and smooth but I don't like the construction at all at the reel handle. It has a gap and no seal and looks like it will not prevent water from getting into at least the crank.

product_meta.title: Penn 1259871 Spinfisher V Spinning Fishing Reel, 4500
product_meta.description: Whether you're surfcasting from the shore or embarking on a multiday billfish hunt, the Penn Spinfisher V Spinning Fishing Reel offers the durability needed to withstand harsh saltwater conditions. This saltwater reel features a watertight design that seals out water and sand from the gearbox and drag system, helping preserve smooth performance even when you're fighting back fierce surf.
feature_bullets: Watertight spinning reel performs reliably in saltwater and sand environments
Durable construction with full metal body, side plate, and techno balanced rotor and heavy-duty aluminum bail wire
Sealed HT-100 Slammer drag system provides robust, silky-smooth drag, while friction trip ramp prevents premature bail trip when casting
Fluid cranking with 5 shielded stainless steel ball bearings and instant anti-reverse bearing
Superline spool requires no backing, is braid ready, and has line capacity rings marked at 1/3, 2/3, and full capacity

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061.
